item.description:
Great Swamp info: http://newportvisions...

10 weeks until Mt. Washington (see May 30th for details)

This is a relatively easy hike on access roads around the Great Swamp, a lot of wildlife, wetlands, forest cover and agricultural land. It is a 5â€“6 mile hike.


Directions from Providence:
Take RI 138 to the village of West Kingston, turn west (a sign points the way) onto Liberty Lane to the end at railroad track. Left on the gravel lane about 1 mile, pass the office and maintenance building and park in a small lot at barred gateway.

If anyone has better directions please email me and I'll post them. I did this hike with another meetup group and managed to find my way there with these directions but more detail would be nice. ~Jenn
item.name: Great Swamp
